title: Good council and advice unto all professors in vvhom there is any tenderness and breathings after the Lord, and the knowledge of his way. By one that hath in the light of the Lord seen through them all, into the resting-place that is prepared for them that truly fear the Lord.
author: Green, William, 17th Cent.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed for Robert Wilson, at the Black-spread eagle ..,
